CustomField.description:
NICC-026811
This field was originally created for the Project Office. Sometimes the IT Business Systems Team will work on customer-facing projects and their hours will need to be logged in the Financialforce - PSA. This field will be checked (set to true) once the Project Office has updated the hours related to the Project Task in FF PSA.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When working on projects where time needs to be logged in Financialforce - PSA, the Project Office will checked this field (set to true) once the time related to the Project has been updated in FF PSA. Valerie Ruocco is currently updating this field.
CustomField.label: PSA Updated
